about_us_text: PicSmi is a service for uploading and sharing images with other users
add_folder_name_length: Folder name has to be at least 3 characters long
create_groups: with your friends and share the most exciting moments of your life.
error_401: You are not authenticated. Please refresh the page and login.
error_403: Error. You do not have permission to do this.
error_500: There was an issue with the server. Try again later.
find: Through this App you can save your favorite images in our servers.
findsecond: Search them more easily through the tags you enter.
folder_choose_name: Choose a name for this folder
folder_modify_no_rights: You don't have the rights to modify this folder.
folder_select: Select a folder for your image...
form_terms_of_service: I have read and accept the Terms of Condition and Service.
group_add_user_exists: already is part of the group!
group_add_user_success: is now part of the group!
group_folder_already_exists: This folder is already being shared in this group
group_name_short: The group name has to be at least 3 characters long!
group_search_user_email: Search for an user email. Minimum of 2 characters.
group_remove_owner: You can't remove the owner of the group!
group_remove_user: has been removed from the group!
group_sharing_success: is now being shared in this group.
group_sharing_removal_success: won't be shared with this group anymore.
group_user_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the user from this group? You may add them later.
invalid_name: Name has to be at least 2 characters long
invalid_password_signup: Password must have at least 1 capital letter, a number and be 8 characters long
invalid_surname: Surname has to be at least 2 characters long
login_not_confirmed_yet: Confirm your registration at the email address
search_images_bold: Search through the images easily using the tags
search_images_normal: you had previously assigned to them.
signup_email_send: A confirmation email has been sent to the email address
signup_welcome: Sign up to start your experience.
thrill: Relive all your memories from your Homepage.
thrillsecond: from the most recent to the oldest.
upload_hover_info: Select at least one tag and a folder for your file
upload_preview: Drag and drop an image here, or click to choose one.
upload_successful: The file has been uploaded successfully!
upload_tags: Choose some tags for your image...
